item.title: US Postal Service halts China parcels after Trump tariffs
item.description: Donald Trump has closed a loophole so low value parcels of goods such as clothing will now be taxed.

item.title: Google lifts its ban on using AI for weapons
item.description: The tech giant has updated the principles governing its development of artificial intelligence.

item.title: Philippines feud escalates as lawmakers vote to impeach vice-president
item.description: It comes amid a bitter feud between President Ferdinand Marcos Jr and his vice-president Sara Duterte.

item.title: Thousands evacuate Santorini as more earthquakes strike island
item.description: Hundreds of earthquakes have rattled the island since Sunday, leading emergency flights to be scheduled.

item.title: Moment tiger and boar rescued from well in India
item.description: Officials say the unlikely pair fell into the water when the tiger was chasing the boar.
